column4: Hi, i've made a unetbootin usb stick and it didn't work. Anyone know why?
Hi, i've made a unetbootin usb stick and it didn't work. Anyone know why?

no error messages, i downloaded ubuntu 8.10 through unetbootin and it extracted etc and put it on my usb stick. and asked me to reboot. so i did and the live menu did not show. it just booted straight into windows
Change your BIOS to boot from usb
